Message.Text: I just don’t see how SQL is going to let us stay agile for this project, Tommy. NoSQL feels like the better choice, but I get the sense we’re going with SQL anyway.
I understand, Frank, but we’ve already committed to teaching relational databases in this course. Switching to NoSQL now could confuse the students.
I know you’re right... It’s just frustrating. I feel like NoSQL would prepare them better for real-world scenarios, but I guess it’s not happening.
It’s tough. I feel bad too because I know how much you care about staying modern. Maybe we can find a way to work NoSQL into a future course?
Yeah, maybe. I just wish we could give the students a taste of it now. Feels like a missed opportunity.
